Asset.Name: Satellites
Asset.Description: In the context of a technology, Satellites covers the study and development of artificial, orbital bodies - not naturally occurring ones like the Moon. Man-made satellites had been a major source of inspiration for science fiction writers through the early 1900's, with visionaries like Arthur C. Clarke laying out plans for a network of mass communications satellites long before such things were technologically feasible.
Asset.Quote: "Now, somehow, in some new way, the sky seemed almost alien." - Lyndon B. Johnson
Asset.Notes: Allows you to build the SS Cockpit, one of the Spaceship parts necessary to win a Science Victory.
